alert.note: Alert for Boone; Colfax; Madison; Platte; Stanton; Wayne (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 4:46PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Madison, western Wayne, northwestern Colfax, Platte, Pierce, eastern Antelope, southeastern Knox, southwestern Cedar, eastern Boone and Stanton Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 446 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles west of Tilden to 3 miles northeast of Newman Grove to 6 miles west of Monroe to 2 miles southwest of Genoa. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Tilden, Oakdale and Meadow Grove around 450 PM CDT. Battle Creek, Platte Center and Lindsay around 500 PM CDT. Humphrey around 505 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Norfolk, Madison, Osmond, Hadar, Creston, Hoskins, Randolph and Stanton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Boone; Colfax; Madison; Platte; Stanton; Wayne
